dict.string: Hiking means a lot to me as it helps to meet and overcome difficulties. Also it gives a great boost of energy for a long time. I believe, my biggest achievement is the conquest of Mount Elbrus at the age of 13.
I'm fond of studying individuals and the society as a whole, functioning of the inner systems and the process of decision-making of different people.
I have been skiing in the mountains regularly since I was 5 years old. I wouldn't trade the feeling of speed when you are going down the slope for anything.
In my free time I enjoy experimenting with design. The design in most of my projects was created and performed by me.
I enjoy reading fiction to examine the point of view of the author in the piece and the period of time when it was written.
